text:
Do you miss Carmen Sandiego?

We may see her again soon on Netflix. As Tracking Board reports, Netflix will release 20 brand new episodes of the legendary ’90s character’s animated series. The purpose will remain the same – to teach children about geography in an entertaining way.

The new voice for Carmen will, according to the same report, be Gina Rodriguez, best known for leading role in Jane the Virgin.
title: Netflix Is Reportedly Reviving Carmen Sandiego With Gina Rodriguez
